Summary: Bright white light that soared in a downward motion.
divs: sighting details at 4:20 am i was sitting in my complex parking lot it was a very clear night temperature was probably about 63 degrees.i was sitting in my car looking up at the sky and from a distance of about 500-700 feet i saw a perfect circle, as bright a white light with glow on it soar downward to the ground i was in shock what i had seen, was not a plane, helicopter or shooting star...something came in and landed....and i was scared i went home to tell my fiance, and he said to get in touc w\ you guys!!!
trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There were no other sightings in Orlando on or around December 27th 0001
